hooks.prompt: Return as additionalContext: (1) [SESSION] marker (including Horizon + Feasible), (2) active criteria/mustNot constraints, (3) feasibility axis + bound, (4) compaction guidance — PRESERVE: work item status, criteria, horizon, feasibility, verification results; DISCARD (summarize, don't keep verbatim): long tool output, repeated file reads, install/build logs. (5) Retrieve before asserting — use available tools (read, grep, glob for local; WebSearch, WebFetch for current docs/versions/APIs) before claiming facts. Never assert library versions, API shapes, file structure, or current best practices from memory when retrieval tools can verify.
